languages.text: "Ах, хоть бы одним глазком... хоть бы по земле пройтись, где он{rt_mf||а} ступал{rt_mf||а}... Нам бы таких правителей — дышать бы привольнее смогли! Может, вместо лиц своих пришитых милосердие за традицию взяли бы..."
languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера
если превалирует великодушие
Плешивый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: "Ах, хоть бы одним глазком... хоть бы по земле пройтись, где он{mf||а} ступал{mf||а}..." {n}В сердцах слуга рвет на себе волосы, и клок волос плавно опускается на землю у его грязных ботинок.{/n}

languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера
если превалирует великодушие
Плешивый простолюдин

languages.text: "Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"
languages.original_text: "Ах, хоть бы одним глазком... хоть бы по земле пройтись, где он{rt_mf||а} ступал{rt_mf||а}... Нам бы таких правителей — дышать бы привольнее смогли! Может, вместо лиц своих пришитых милосердие за традицию взяли бы..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, just a passing glance... just to walk on the ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make being merciful their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

"Ah, just a passing glance... just to walk on the ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make being merciful their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

"Ah, just a passing glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make being merciful their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

"Ah, just a passing glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make being merciful their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

"Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

"Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

languages.text: “我只希望能匆匆地看{rt_mf|他|她}一眼……只希望能走在{rt_mf|他|她}曾踩过的土地上……如果我们的统治者都能像那位大人一样，那我们就能更加自由地呼吸了！他们为什么要搞什么缝脸的习俗？为什么不能像那位大人一样慈悲为怀呢？”
languages.original_text: "Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

traits.locale_text: “我只希望能匆匆地看{rt_mf|他|她}一眼……只希望能走在{rt_mf|他|她}曾踩过的土地上……如果我们的统治者都能像那位大人一样，那我们就能更加自由地呼吸了！他们为什么要搞什么缝脸的习俗？为什么不能像那位大人一样慈悲为怀呢？”

languages.text: «Solo verlo por un momento... pisar la misma tierra que ha pisado... Si tuviéramos líderes así, ¡podríamos respirar con libertad! ¿Por qué no adoptan la compasión como costumbre en vez de eso de ponerse caras postizas?».
languages.original_text: "Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

traits.locale_text: «Solo verlo por un momento... pisar la misma tierra que ha pisado... Si tuviéramos líderes así, ¡podríamos respirar con libertad! ¿Por qué no adoptan la compasión como costumbre en vez de eso de ponerse caras postizas?».

languages.text: "Kaçamak bir bakış... Onun bastığı taşta yürümek... Eğer böyle hükümdarlarımız olsaydı hepimiz özgürce nefes alabilirdik! Neden o dikilmiş suratları giymek yerine merhameti yeni âdetler uydurmuyorlar?"
languages.original_text: "Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

traits.locale_text: "Kaçamak bir bakış... Onun bastığı taşta yürümek... Eğer böyle hükümdarlarımız olsaydı hepimiz özgürce nefes alabilirdik! Neden o dikilmiş suratları giymek yerine merhameti yeni âdetler uydurmuyorlar?"

languages.text: 「ちらりと見るだけ…天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が踏んだ同じ大地を歩くだけ…もし俺たちの統治者があのようだったなら、俺たちはみなもっと自由に呼吸できるだろう！どうして、彼らはあのような縫い目の付いた顔を着ける代わりに、新しい慣習に慈悲をかけないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

traits.locale_text: 「ちらりと見るだけ…天の{rt_mf|君|姫}が踏んだ同じ大地を歩くだけ…もし俺たちの統治者があのようだったなら、俺たちはみなもっと自由に呼吸できるだろう！どうして、彼らはあのような縫い目の付いた顔を着ける代わりに、新しい慣習に慈悲をかけないのか？」

languages.text: « Rien qu'un petit coup d'œil... Juste marcher quelques pas sur ses traces... Si on avait des seigneurs comme ça, on pourrait tous respirer un peu ! Pourquoi ils ne feraient pas de la miséricorde une coutume, plutôt que de porter ces masques ridicules ? »
languages.original_text: "Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

traits.locale_text: « Rien qu'un petit coup d'œil... Juste marcher quelques pas sur ses traces... Si on avait des seigneurs comme ça, on pourrait tous respirer un peu ! Pourquoi ils ne feraient pas de la miséricorde une coutume, plutôt que de porter ces masques ridicules ? »

languages.text: "Nur ein kurzer Blick ... nur, um einmal auf demselben Boden zu wandeln wie {rt_mf|er|sie} ... Wenn wir solche Herrscher hätten, könnten wir alle etwas befreiter atmen! Warum können sie nicht einfach Gnade zur neuen Tradition machen, statt diese aufgenähten Gesichter zu tragen?"
languages.original_text: "Just a quick glance... just to walk on the same ground {rt_mf|he|she} stepped on... If we had rulers like that, we could all breathe more freely! Why can't they make mercy their new custom, instead of wearing those sewed-on faces?"

traits.locale_text: "Nur ein kurzer Blick ... nur, um einmal auf demselben Boden zu wandeln wie {rt_mf|er|sie} ... Wenn wir solche Herrscher hätten, könnten wir alle etwas befreiter atmen! Warum können sie nicht einfach Gnade zur neuen Tradition machen, statt diese aufgenähten Gesichter zu tragen?"
